additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: MINI MENTOSRAINBOW. Chewy fruit flavoured confectionery. Ingredients: sugar, glucose syrup, hydrogenated coconut oil, acidity regulator (citric acid), rice starch, thickeners (gum arabic, gellan gum), natural, nature identical and artificial flavours, glazing agents(carnauba wax, beeswax), emulsifier (sucrose esters of fatty acids), colours (anthocyanins, sodium copper chlorophyllin, carotenes, curcumin, beet red). MINI STRAWBERRY MIX. Assorted chewy confectionery with different strawberry flavours. Ingredients:sugar, glucose syrup, acidity regulators (citric acid, malic acid), hydrogenated coconut oil, rice starch, thickeners (gum arabic, gellan gum), natural and nature identical flavours, glazing agents (carnauba wax, beeswax), emulsifier (sucrose esters of fatty acids), colour (beet red). MINI MENTOS CANDY CANE. Chewy vanilla-mint flavoured confectionery. Ingredients: sugar, glucose syrup, hydrogenated coconut oil, nature identical and artificial flavours, rice starch, thickeners (gum arabic, gellan gum), emulsifier (sucrose esters of fatty acids), glazing agents (carnauba wax, beeswax). MINI CHUPA CHUPS THE BEST OF. Lollipops, assorted flavours. Ingredients: sugar, glucose syrup, whey powder (milk), mix fruit puree (apple, cherry, raspberry, pineapple, lime, lemon, strawberry, peach, banana, orange, blueberry, blackberry, mango, watermelon, kiwi) (2%), acidity regulators (lactic acid, malic acid, citric acid), whole milkpowder, natural and nature identical flavours, cocoa butter, fat reduced cocoa powder, antioxidant (ascorbic acid), cocoa extract, colours (caramel IV, paprika oleoresins, curcumin, beet red). Contains milk.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Mini Mentos products contain beeswax/Chupa Chups contain milk

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Not all flavors may be included in this pack.
